Alternatively, if you'd like something a bit more action-packed with a post-apocalyptic twist, "Six-String Samurai" offers a unique blend of rock 'n' roll and samurai adventure set in a world gone mad!

I think I have just the thing for you! Have you considered "End of Watch"? It's a gritty, intense film that explores the daily struggles of two police officers in LA as they face the harsh realities of their job. The documentary-style filmmaking adds an extra layer of authenticity to the story, and David Harbour and Frank Grillo give great performances.

If you're looking for something a bit more lighthearted, "Super" might be up your alley! It's a fun, quirky film that pays homage to classic superhero movies while also exploring themes of imagination and perseverance. With a talented cast including Ellen Page and Kevin Bacon, it's a wild ride that's sure to leave you smiling.
